cardText: A fun trivia style game. Keep track of high score and try to beat it. Applications: Bulma CSS, jQuery, API's, SoundManager2, AJAX, JSON, Git Bash, GitHub
Look up the weather anywhere in the United States to plan a vacation. Applications: Bootstrap, JavaScript, jQuery, LocalStorage

Have a little fun devouring burgers. Applications: Handlebars.js, Node.js, MySql, Express, Heroku
Keep track of your appointments and activities on a daily basis. Applications: Bootstrap, HTML, CSS
Keep track of your department employees. Backend application only. Applications: Inquirer, HTML, JavaScript, CSS
